dynGuiComponents.text: Fleece Music Blankets Handmade by CMD Hostess Sandy Hedgecock Double Layered for warmth Center stitching for durability Reversible One-of-a-kind blankets Great for picnics, watching TV, cuddling, and staying warm anywhere. See our inventory at: http://www.classicalsavings.com/apps/search?q=blanket New blankets added as they are made.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: An exquisitely rhapsodic cycle of music, it is a transformative journey of consciousness—with lyrics that offer a new vocabulary of mantra. Originally composed as "modern mantras" or plain chants for listening or joining in, these epiphanic rounds, voiced a cappella, return us to the spiritual origins of all song- the merging of words and music to illuminate and elevate.Classical Music Discoveries is sponsored by La Musica International Chamber Music Festival and Uber. @khedgecock#ClassicalMusicDiscoveries #KeepClassicalMusicAlive#LaMusicaFestival #CMDGrandOperaCompanyofVenice #CMDParisPhilharmonicinOrléans#CMDGermanOperaCompanyofBerlin#CMDGrandOperaCompanyofBarcelonaSpain#ClassicalMusicLivesOn#Uber Please consider supporting our show, thank you!http://www.classicalsavings.com/store/p1378/The_Book_of_Rounds.html staff@classicalmusicdiscoveries.com This album is broadcasted with the permission of Anita Daly from Daly Communications.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: We present conductor Mirga Gražinytė-Tyla and the City of Birmingham Symphony Orchestra’s next installment of The British Project. This release marks the third chapter of the project, presenting works by Elgar and Vaughan Williams after last October’s release of Britten’s Sinfonia da Requiem. Which was followed earlier this year by a second installment, presenting the Symphonic Suite from Walton’s opera Troilus and Cressida.Purchase the music (without talk) at:http://www.classicalsavings.com/store/p1377/Britten%3A_Sinfonia_da_Requiem.htmlYour purchase helps to support our show! Classical Music Discoveries is sponsored by La Musica International Chamber Music Festival and Uber. @khedgecock#ClassicalMusicDiscoveries #KeepClassicalMusicAlive#LaMusicaFestival #CMDGrandOperaCompanyofVenice #CMDParisPhilharmonicinOrléans#CMDGermanOperaCompanyofBerlin#CMDGrandOperaCompanyofBarcelonaSpain#ClassicalMusicLivesOn#Uber Please consider supporting our show, thank you!http://www.classicalsavings.com/donate.html staff@classicalmusicdiscoveries.com This album is broadcasted with the permission of Katy Solomon from Morahana Arts and Media.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: Episode 160: 17160 The Visionaries of Piano Music

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: This 2-CD set explores the visionary piano music of Elizathean composers William Byrd and John Bull as performed by Kit Armstrong.WorksBull, J: Chromatic (Queen Elisabeth's) PavanBull, J: Fantasia on a Fugue of SweelinckBull, J: Les BuffonsBull, J: Melancholy PavanBull, J: My GriefBull, J: WalsinghamByrd: Earl of Oxford's MarchByrd: John come kiss me nowByrd: O mistress mine, I mustByrd: Pavan "Sir William Petre"Byrd: Pavana "The Earle of Salisbury"Byrd: Sellinger's RoundByrd: The BellsByrd: The Maiden Song, MB82Byrd: The wood so wildByrd: Ut re mi fa sol laByrd: Ut, mi, reByrd: WalsinghamPurchase the music (without talk) at:http://www.classicalsavings.com/store/p1369/The_Visionaries_of_Piano_Music.htmlYour purchase helps to support our show! Classical Music Discoveries is sponsored by La Musica International Chamber Music Festival and Uber. @khedgecock#ClassicalMusicDiscoveries #KeepClassicalMusicAlive#LaMusicaFestival #CMDGrandOperaCompanyofVenice #CMDParisPhilharmonicinOrléans#CMDGermanOperaCompanyofBerlin#CMDGrandOperaCompanyofBarcelonaSpain#ClassicalMusicLivesOn#Uber Please consider supporting our show, thank you!http://www.classicalsavings.com/donate.html staff@classicalmusicdiscoveries.com

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: An exquisitely rhapsodic cycle of music, it is a transformative journey of consciousness—with lyrics that offer a new vocabulary of mantra. Originally composed as "modern mantras" or plain chants for listening or joining in, these epiphanic rounds, voiced a cappella, return us to the spiritual origins of all song- the merging of words and music to illuminate and elevate.Classical Music Discoveries is sponsored by La Musica International Chamber Music Festival and Uber. @khedgecock#ClassicalMusicDiscoveries #KeepClassicalMusicAlive#LaMusicaFestival #CMDGrandOperaCompanyofVenice #CMDParisPhilharmonicinOrléans#CMDGermanOperaCompanyofBerlin#CMDGrandOperaCompanyofBarcelonaSpain#ClassicalMusicLivesOn#Uber Please consider supporting our show, thank you!http://www.classicalsavings.com/store/p1378/The_Book_of_Rounds.html staff@classicalmusicdiscoveries.com This album is broadcasted with the permission of Anita Daly from Daly Communications.
